mutants.code:
def maximize_digit_sum(n: int) -> int:
    if n <= 10:
        return n
    a = int((len(str(n)) - 1) * '9')
    b = n - a
    digit_sum = sum([int(i) for i in list(str(a)) + list(str(b))])
    return digit_sum

def maximize_digit_sum(n: int) -> int:
    if n < 10:
        return n
    a = int((len(str(n)) - 1) * '9')
    b = n - a
    digit_sum = sum([int(i) for i in list(str(a)) * list(str(b))])
